diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Deep vein thrombosis (DVT) and pulmonary embolism (PE)
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with a swollen right leg and shortness of breath and was diagnosed with right iliofemoral vein thrombosis and pulmonary embolism through venous ultrasound and chest CT. Risk factors such as oral contraceptive use, dehydration, and familial history of DVT were noted.
